Detailed Description

Definition d'otils geonetriques.

Ce fichier ne contient que des fonctions non membres qu'il me semblait plus logique de construire comme tel qu'en tant que methode d'une classe specifique.

Define Documentation

#define DEGREES   1

mode : mode for computing a color from a value.

Function Documentation

Vector3D tools_colorFromValue ( int  _mode,
double  _value 
)

NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Creates a color from a value.

Creates a color from a value : The value is the angle given by the future color on the TLS circle. (it represents the T value, while the L value is set to 0.5 and the S value is set to 1).

Parameters:
_mode : mode of coding the value. Should be RADIANS or DEGREES
_value : angle to convert in a color.
Returns:
(Vector3D) Returns the color fathered by the value.

void tools_couleurfinale ( Vector3D  tls,
Vector3D &  rgb 
)

NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Part of a pipeline of functions to convert a TLS color to a RGB one.

Part of a pipeline of functions to convert a TLS color to a RGB one. The other parts of the process are the tools_couleursaturee and the tools_couleurfinale. The whole process is given by the tools_TLStoRGB or the tools_colorFromValue functions.

This function modify the rslt color by taking in account the S value of the TLS coded color.

Parameters:
_tls : a color coded in a TLS format and stored in a Vector3D. This is the color to convert into RGB format.
_rgb : this will contain the result of the operation.
Returns:
(void)

void tools_couleurpure ( Vector3D  tls,
Vector3D &  rgb 
)

NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Part of a pipeline of functions to convert a TLS color to a RGB one.

Part of a pipeline of functions to convert a TLS color to a RGB one. The other parts of the process are the tools_couleursaturee and the tools_couleurfinale. The whole process is given by the tools_TLStoRGB or the tools_colorFromValue functions.

This function modify the rslt color by taking in account the T value of the TLS coded color..

Parameters:
_tls : a color coded in a TLS format and stored in a Vector3D. This is the color to convert into RGB format.
_rgb : this will contain the result of the operation.
Returns:
(void)

Vector3D &  rgb 
)

NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Part of a pipeline of functions to convert a TLS color to a RGB one.

Part of a pipeline of functions to convert a TLS color to a RGB one. The other parts of the process are the tools_couleursaturee and the tools_couleurfinale. The whole process is given by the tools_TLStoRGB or the tools_colorFromValue functions.

This function modify the rslt color by taking in account the L value of the TLS coded color.

Parameters:
_tls : a color coded in a TLS format and stored in a Vector3D. This is the color to convert into RGB format.
_rgb : this will contain the result of the operation.

(void)

Vector3D tools_crossProduct ( Vector3D  _u,
Vector3D  _v 
)

NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Computes the cross product of two 3D vectors.

Computes the cross product of two 3D vectors.

Parameters:
_u : vector we want to compute the cross product with _v.
_v : vector we want to compute the cross product with _u.
Returns:
(Vector3D) Returns the result of the cross product of the two vectors given in parameter.

Vector3D tools_TLStoRGB ( Vector3D  _color  ) 

NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Convert a TLS color to a RGB one.

Convert a TLS color to a RGB one.

Parameters:
_color : color coded in a Vector3D in a TLS format we want to convert into RGB format.
Returns:
(Vector3D) Returns the converted in RGB color.
